================
textual-wrapper
================

.. start short_desc

**GUI window wrapper around a Textual app (or any other terminal program).**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``textual-wrapper`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install textual-wrapper

.. end installation
